title: Installation issue: Rose
body:
Trying to install chill, its dependency rose 9.10.0 fails to build with the error output below. I think the critical error is failure to download EDG but there are some other potential issues mentioned. I am building with gcc-7.3.0 on a RHEL6 system. 

```

==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j12'
```
